name: Refugee
//: Vanessa is a middle-aged hairdresser.  She doesn't want to talk about her past.

responses.text: What's your story?
How are things here?
Is there anything I can do to help you out?
I'd like to hire out those scissors of yours.
Hmm, can we change this haircut a little please?
Hmm, can we change this shave a little please?
What were you saying before?
I'd better get going.

dynamic_line.no: Oh, great.  Another new mouth to feed?  Just what we need.  Well, I'm Vanessa.

responses.text: I'm not a new mouth to feed, but nice to meet you too.
Hi, Vanessa.  What's up?
Yeah, no.  I'm going.

dynamic_line: Well that's good.  If you're going to pull your own weight I guess that's an improvement.
Not much is up.  Not enough, in fact.  Here we are stuck in this slum pit with a bunch of strangers, and all we can do is sit around staring at our hands.
I don't really want to talk about my life before this shit-show, if that's what you mean.  I don't need a shoulder to cry on.  I'm a hairdresser, is that enough personal information for you?

responses.text: Could you give me a haircut?

dynamic_line.no: You want the sarcastic version, or the really sarcastic version?  I'm stuck in a dank shitty brick building with two dozen strangers, the world's dead, and there's not enough food to go around.  Why don't you fuckin' figure it out?
dynamic_line.yes: Well, I'm stuck in a dank shitty brick building with two dozen strangers, the world's dead, and there's not enough food to go around.  At least I can do some work to keep me busy though, and the extra merch does go a long way to keeping my belly full.  People like getting a good haircut.

dynamic_line: I can see you need one, but last time I used these shears it was to stab a zombie in the face.  I don't think you'd want them in your hair.  Maybe you could help me get set up properly?

responses.text: What can I do to help you out?
What were you saying before?
I'd better get going.

dynamic_line: Sure, I can give you a haircut.  It'll be six merch for a haircut, or three for a shave, okay?

responses.text: Please give me a haircut.
Please give me a shave.
Actually, you owe me a free haircut, remember?
That's a bit rich for my blood.  What were you saying before?
That's a bit rich for my blood.  I better head out.

dialogue.describe: If I had some equipment, I could do some hairdresser work here.
dialogue.offer: I didn't think to pack my hairdressing equipment when I was evacuated.  If you could put together a basic hair cutting kit for me, I could do a bit of styling for people around here.  I'll even give you a free haircut for your troubles.
dialogue.accepted: Cool, thanks.  It'll be good to have something useful to do, and to not be staring at so many shaggy slobs.
dialogue.rejected: Whatever, I'll keep twiddling my thumbs then.
dialogue.advice: I don't need too much.  Scissors, a small mirror, a bit of cloth, and some way to keep it all stored clean when I'm not using it, like a leather pouch or something.  I can get the rest of what I need from shelter supplies.
dialogue.success: Well, this is pretty serviceable.  Heck, these scissors are nice enough that I could probably inexplicably make your hair longer or a different color with them.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do me?
dialogue.failure: Seriously?  You failed to find *scissors*?  How do you tie your shoes in the morning?
